evidence.source_document: Order Granting Joint Motion for Final Approval of Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: Defendants shall pay Plaintiffs the amount of $400,000 in costs are reasonable

extracted.value: Defendants shall pay Plaintiffs the amount of $400,000 in costs

evidence.source_document: Order Granting Joint Motion for Final Approval of Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: The Court shall retain jurisdiction over all disputes between and among the Parties arising out of the Agreement, including but not limited to interpretation and enforcement of the terms of the Agreement, except as provided in the Agreement and pursuant to the terms of the Agreement

extracted.value: The Court shall retain jurisdiction over all disputes between and among the Parties arising out of the Agreement, including but not limited to interpretation and enforcement of the terms of the Agreement, except as provided in the Agreement and pursuant to the terms of the Agreement
